headline: JACK MORTON ANNOUNCES NEW US PRESIDENT ALONG WITH LEADERSHIP PROMOTIONS IN GROWTH, CREATIVE AND CLIENT SERVICES
summary: Jack Morton, the leading global brand experience agency, proudly announces the promotion of John Howard to President, US and Ashley Brantman to SVP, Head of Growth US, Co-Head, Jack 39, alongside significant senior advancements in creative and client service roles. This strategic move follows last year's appointment of Patrick Bennett as Global Chief Creative Officer, underscoring the agency's commitment to excellence and innovation.
